statements: DELETE FROM fitness_tracker WHERE user_id = 1 AND activity_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM fitness_tracker WHERE duration_minutes > 30 AND fitness_activity = 'Running';
DELETE FROM fitness_tracker WHERE user_id = 123 AND duration_minutes >= 30;
DELETE FROM fitness_tracker WHERE activity_date < '2023-01-01' AND fitness_activity = 'Running';
DELETE FROM health_goals WHERE user_id = 10 AND target_calories < 1500;
DELETE FROM meditation_practices WHERE user_id = 7 AND practice_date = '2022-01-15';
